name: Splatterlinge
tagline: A project of advanced game development at the university of Ravensburg-Weingarten
body:
### Welcome to Splatterlinge.
This game is just for fun! Don't take it serious!


### Build

#### Requirements
```
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake libopenal-dev libvorbis-dev libglew-dev
```

#### Build
```
$ git clone https://github.com/zwostein/Ununoctium.git
$ cd Ununoctium
$ git checkout master
$ cmake .
$ make
```

#### Run Game
```
$ cd Ununoctium
$ bin/Ununoctium
```
